name: Alien Breed: Tower Assault
description:
Alien Breed: Tower Assault is an action-arcade game developed by Team17 Digital and East Point Software. It came out on 01-01-1994. Team17 Digital published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Alien Breed: Tower Assault is available on Commodore / Amiga and PC.
Allister Brimble scored the game.
